extendedInfo.description: ** SALE: To celebrate the release of Spira 2, all my X Defence Pro games are discounted!A tower defence game with a twist. You must defend your base from enemy attack by building/upgrading defence towers. Money is awarded for kills to spend on upgrades. Interest is earned on the money not spent.** Samsung Galaxy S2 Issues: If the game is randomly crashing for you, please play with the sound off from the options screen. I'm working to find a solution.** Ad Supported** Pro version also available** News, FAQ and Hi Scores at:** http://funqai.com/and_spiradef.html

reviews.title: OnAwesome
reviews.comment: One of the best tower defense games I\'ve played.... woohoooo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Innovative game!
reviews.comment: Alot of fun to play. More features or towers and I would definitely purchase. As a free game its beyond great. Must play at least once.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun and challenging game. Very interesting take on the tower defense classic
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A unique TD game.
reviews.comment: I particularly dig the simple graphics and clear mechanics.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy
reviews.comment: Easy.. shouldbe more challenging keep a rapid upgraded, get a slow and splash, upgrade splash  a bit, then 2others later on if you feel like it. On later levels start using the bonuses.. dmg and range, mny if you wanna boost your cash to upgrade that rapid and save bomb for last few levels makes yhem easily passable. Tip for rapid is to switch how it targets from hard during beginning of round to weak and close sometimes near end. Hope this helps, using this technique i completed  round 72 on my 3rd time playing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great addictive game but it keeps closing itself mid game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No problems! :-)
reviews.comment: I love this never lets me down pls download this and try ill give stars its really fun and i get gold tower in the middle for a strong base. And thank for telling me thats fun first time i saw felt weird and IM ADDICTED and thx for making this game im not uninstaling this
reviews.author: Senen Tamargo

reviews.title: Full of game play
reviews.comment: Don\'t be fooled by the low wend graphics and simple concept. For a TD game with only one map it is full of game play.

reviews.comment: but woah... eats a lot of battery. Ls670/Optimus S

reviews.title: Fun for hours!
reviews.comment: The best tower defense game out there!  The sample version lets you play and acheive just enough to get you hooked.  A must-have app!

reviews.title: Amazingly addictive
reviews.comment: Seems so simple at first but it gets hard fast and you\'ll find yourself not wanting to stop playing. Great!
